scripts.start: yarn concurrently "cd vendure && yarn serve:test" "cd _gridsome_template && yarn gridsome develop"
scripts.serve:local: yarn concurrently "export NODE_ENV=local yarn gridsome develop" "nodemon --ext js,vue --watch '../_shared-components/' --exec 'yarn upgrade shared-components'"
scripts.bootstrap: yarn && yarn lerna clean -y && yarn lerna bootstrap && yarn lerna run build
